name: koalabot
description: Discord.js v14 Bot for managing Minecraft Servers.

scripts.dev: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp src/assets/minecraft.ttf dist/assets/minecraft.ttf && node dist/index.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp src/assets/minecraft.ttf dist/assets/minecraft.ttf
scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp src/assets/minecraft.ttf dist/assets/minecraft.ttf && NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js

author: defnot
